title: How to Appeal an Asylum Decision

required.appeal_letter_note: You must submit this to challenge the rejection.
required.rejection_notice_note: Attach the letter you received with the rejection reasons.
required.legal_help_note: Seek advice from a lawyer or NGO to guide you through the process.

optional.supporting_documents_note: Any new evidence about your situation can strengthen your appeal.
optional.witness_statements_note: Letters or statements from people who can confirm your story.

warning: ⚠️ Appeals are time-sensitive. You usually have only a few days to submit your appeal after receiving the rejection. Do not delay.
